mapper.select: select t1.row_id id, date_format(t1.created,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') created, t1.username username, t1.fst_name firstName, t1.company_code companyCode, t1.company_code companyCodeLovType, t1.emp_status status, t1.emp_type empType, t1.emp_role role, t1.emp_contact contact, t1.emp_tel contactPhone, 1 errorTimes from LNK_EMP_INFO t1 where not exists ( select s1.user_id from LNK_INTER_USER_POSTN s1 where t1.row_id = s1.user_id and s1.postn_id = #{mvgParentId} ) and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid}

select t1.row_id interId, t1.user_Id id, date_format(t1.created,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') created, t3.username username, t3.fst_name firstName, t3.emp_status status, 1 errorTimes, (case when t2.user_id = t3.row_id then 'Y' else 'N' end) isDefault, t1.postn_id postnId from LNK_INTER_USER_POSTN t1 left join LNK_POSTN_EXT t2 on t1.postn_id = t2.row_id left join LNK_EMP_INFO t3 on t1.user_id = t3.row_id where 1=1 and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid} and t1.postn_id = #{mvgParentId}
mapper.insert: insert into LNK_INTER_USER_POSTN (row_id, user_id, postn_id) values (#{id}, #{mvgSubsetId}, #{mvgParentId})
